title: "Baidu launches sign language virtual host for 2022 Winter Olympics"
excerpt: "In preparation for the Olympics, Chinese tech giant Baidu rolled out Wednesday a sign language virtual host in partnership with Chinese state broadcaster CCTV. The digital female host is intended to translate events during the 16-day Winter Olympic Games slated to start on February 4,"
